name: Fractionalized WAVE-999
description: The evolution of digital, non-fungible assets NFTs, meet DeFi. Bridgesplit is the financial infrastructure for cross-chain non-fungible tokens, providing the composability and liquidity needed for the next phase of web3. Fractionalization Fractionalization of NFTs enables holders to sell only a portion of their asset, enables access to blue-chip assets at lower price points, and for communities to grow beyond 10,000.
